timeline.content:
Hi Felix Glynn-baker, üòä

I hope you're doing well! üåü

I'm Aashutush from the UCL Accommodation Portal. I've been trying to get in touch with you regarding the interest you showed in one of the properties, Bloomsbury Janet Poole House, London . üè°

Could you please let me know a good time for us to connect? Looking forward to hearing from you! ‚ú®

Thanks a lot! üòä

Best regards,
Ashutush
